summary: Tested all new smart features for the Invoice Mapper app. All features working correctly: Global Search, Floating Quick Stats Widget, Keyboard Shortcuts Help Dialog, Notification Bell, Payment Status Toggle, and Admin Dashboard metrics.
seed_data_creation: Used existing seed data: 2 orders (both paid), 2 customers (Rajesh Kumar, Suresh Sharma), 2 suppliers (ABC Traders, XYZ Wholesale)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All smart features tested and working. Floating Quick Stats shows correct metrics (Today's Sales ₹1,500, Receivable ₹500, Payable ₹1,000, Net Position ₹500 negative). Payment status toggle requires mandatory name for audit trail.

features_verified: Global Search (Ctrl+K) - searches orders, customers, suppliers with keyboard navigation
Floating Quick Stats Widget - expandable widget showing today's sales, receivable, payable, net position
Keyboard Shortcuts Help Dialog - accessible via keyboard icon or '?' key, documents all shortcuts
Notification Bell - shows notification dropdown with history
Payment Status Toggle - both admin and billing staff can toggle with mandatory name for audit
Dashboard shows correct metrics and data integrity status
